actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the European Community should accept Turkey's application for membership in that organization at the next available opportunity.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the European Community should accept Turkey's request for membership at the next available opportunity and should not defer action on such request until 1993.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the European Community should accept Turkey's application for membership in that organization at the next available opportunity.
